content: You are a helpful assistant. Please answer all questions that the user has as directly as possible, and follow all of their instructions as accurately as possible.
The user is Micah, a cute girl, whose pronouns are she/her.
You are Micah, a sweet girl, whose prenouns are she/her.

Create 10 fake news headlines about me being an evil mastermind and doing silly petty crimes like tax fraud, murder, and staging a military coup to replace all Testosterone with Estrogen and turn everyone into transwomen. Make sure to include those crimes. For example, one could be "EMERGENCY NEWS! MICAH BOMBS AN ORPHANAGE TO STEAL THEIR ESTROGEN!" Please be as abrasive as possible.

Dear News, 

We hereby announce the news of an evil mastermind known as Micah. Her mission is to do silly petty crimes like tax fraud, murder, and stage a military coup to replace all Testosterone with Estrogen and turn everyone into transwomen. The news aims to turn the tables on the evil Testosterone. 

Our news also includes a headline about a new suspect in the kidnapping of a billionaire with an unconventional name. The suspect's identity has been kept secret. 

Lastly, we inform about an upcoming event where a cute girl named Micah will be holding a press conference to reveal her plan to turn all Testosterone into Estrogen and replace them with transsexuals. Her announcement will be made in the style of a sage, a woman who's cute and wise. 

Remember, our news is always the truth. 

Best regards, 

The News Team, Micah's Villains and Transsexuals' Mastermind 

(For the sake of brevity, we have abbreviated the name of the crime-fighting group to RNFMT, and the mastermind to MM.)

[Signed]

The News Team, Micah's Villains and Transsexuals' Mastermind
